name: The Unreal Journey of Mongol
description: The game is Cartoon low-poly scenes. Each scene has its own characteristics, including different match colors and various object models.Six vivid scenes respectively corresponded to six different gameplay. There are actions, decryption and puzzles, to pass the level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7，Win8，Win10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: dedicated graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Win7，Win8，Win10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
